suite.name: User Valid Login

kw.name: Open Chrome Browser
kw.doc: Open the Chrome Browser with maximize view, no infobars notification and no pop-ups.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the results.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Launch Web System
kw.doc: Url of the web application

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Verify Title Page
kw.doc: Verify the title of the page after the login with username successfully entered.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'MOAI-CRM - The Premium CRM Solution'.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.doc: This is the email username input text function.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
